auth.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
auth.createAccountPrompt: Create an account to get started.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Please enter your new password below.

error.providerMismatchDescription: An account with this email already exists but was created with a password. Please log in using your password.
error.wrongProvider: This account is registered via {{provider}}. Please log in using that method.

group.noGroups: You don't have any groups yet. Create your first one!
group.createNewDescription: Name your new shopping list. You can invite friends to it later.
group.deleteGroupPrompt: Are you sure you want to delete the group {{groupName}}? This action cannot be undone.

changeNameDialog.title: Change group name
changeNameDialog.description:: Enter a new name for your shopping list.

shoppingList.noItems: This list is still empty. Add the first product!

dialog.title: Invite to group
dialog.description: Enter the email of the person you want to invite to the group "{{groupName}}".

app.title: App
app.description: Customize the look and language of the app.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Set how often you want to receive notifications.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.deleteAccountDescription: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data. This action is irreversible.

deleteAccountDialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccountDialog.description: This action is irreversible. All your data, groups you are the sole member of, and shopping lists will be permanently deleted. To confirm, please type the phrase below.
